enWisdom: Have faith and you will be safe
If you have faith in Allah, your place of return will be secure

Wisdom: إِذَا آمَنْتَ بِاللَّهِ وَاتَّقَيْتَ مَحَارِمَهُ أَحَلَّكَ دَارَ الْأَمَانِ وَإِذَا أَرْضَيْتَهُ تَغَمَّدَكَ بِالرِّضْوَانِ
enWisdom: If you believe in Allah and abstain from what He has forbidden, He will put you in the Abode of Peace, and if you please Him, He will cover you with [divine] favour

Wisdom: مَا مِنْ شَيْ‏ءٍ يَحْصُلُ بِهِ الْأَمَانُ أَبْلَغُ مِنْ إِيمَانٍ وَإِحْسَانٍ
enWisdom: Nothing brings greater security than [having] faith and [performing] good deeds
